description: Update a lowest losing bid prediction subject detail.
permissions: Allowed for admins and broker admins for the related prediction subject (policy delegates to prediction_subject).
side_effects: Updates the detail record and triggers prediction subject updates (domain reset and actual/lowest bid recalculation when bid fields or bid_details change). If bid_details change and a broker exists, it syncs bidders and prediction subject bids from the bid details. Updates or recreates the self-bidder prediction_subject_bid amount when bid_amount changes.
validation_notes: Requires the <id> argument. At least one attribute flag must be provided. bid-details must be valid JSON; each element amount must be numeric if present. prediction_subject must have kind "lowest_losing_bid". walk-away-bid-amount cannot be changed when gaps depend on walk-away values. bid-amount or bid-details cannot be changed when gaps depend on the actual value.

flags.name: --bid-details
flags.validation: Must be valid JSON array; each element amount must be numeric if present.
